Replies.Reply: A sensei once counseled a grief-
. He said, "Child, why do you cry?
..and even... distance.
MICHAELANGELO!
Well?
Ahh! Butter creme frosting!
But I-
-Donatello! I am your Master!
He-heh. You have done well, my son.

Michaelangelo. Boredom is never an indicator of your surroundings. It is a reflection of your inner heart. Fill yourself with excitement on the inside... and you'll live the most rewarding life of all.
Enter.
That you are, my son. You must now apply all that you have learned on your lengthy journey to your everyday life. THAT will be the most challenging training of all...
I've missed you, Leonardo.

I'm afraid much has changed in your brothers' spirits since you have left. But now that you are home, they will finally have the ethical and warrior leadership they have been lacking. The family needs you.
Raphael, your brother is home.
A true leader knows how to motivate his troops regardless of their own motivations.
Good morning, my sons.
If anyone needs me, I'll be watching my stories.
My sons, what-
I believe you boys have some explaining to do...
Leonardo, I am most disappointed in you. You are the leader of your brothers. I was counting on you to bring order to the chaos of this family.
There are no excuses when you are the Leader, my student.
But the involvement of the Foot and their mysterious leader worries me.
Raphael, there are better ways to use your skills in ninjitsu. Fact-
Leonardo, time cannot be moved faster by wearing a groove in our floor.
Leonardo, a true leader knows the virtue of patience... and when to stop exercising it.
Raphael? What is the matter?
Raphael! Kneel.
Go on...
Raphael. You always bear the world's problems on your shoulders.
But you must realize that while, at times, you may not be my favorite student, it does not mean that you are my least favorite son.
You are strong, passionate and loyal to a fault. These are the merits of a great leader as well...
Well then, I believe your brothers may be in need of a leader.
Together.
I heard that!
I apologize my sons.
Mister Winters. We mean you no harm.
They must face them alone. As brothers.
Wonderful, my son. WONDERFUL!
Yes. Yes, my sons.
My sons, I am so proud of you all.
What kind of business?
Sit down, Raphael.
That, my son, you already have.
Our training works in mysterious ways. But the answer that lies in all our questions... is family.
And more importantly, you are brothers. And brothers you shall remain, despite time... argument...
Ah, Raphael. Your brothers and I were just discussing the vigilante Nightwatcher once again.
Raphael! If bullying is the only way to argue your point, then perhaps you do not have much of a point to begin with.
Ahh. Double chocolate fudge.
You monsters!
It's a miracle!
We appreciate the generous donation for the continued protection of your village.
After all, the jungle can be a very dangerous place. BAH-HAHAHAHA.
Idiota! Watch where you're going!
Well, what are you waiting for?!
What?! WHAT IS IT?!
WHO ARE YOU?! SHOW YOURSELF!!
What?!
COWARD!! GET BACK HERE!!
SHOW YOURSELF! DO YOU REALIZE WHO  YOU'RE DEALING WITH?!
Let's see if a ghost can die, then.
There's a log on the road, senor.
...that wasn't there an hour ago.
D-d-dios mio.
...The Ghost of the Jungle.
I'm sorry, senor.
...yirk!
OOF!
The jungle god that punishes those who prey upon the weak.
He's coming... for us.
I am not afraid of a myth!
A  I'M NOT AFRAID OF A GHOST!
Actually... it's "Turtle", pal.
The Ghost of the Jungle.
My training is now complete.
Mmm... home sweet home.
I have completed my training, master. I am prepared for the next stage.
I've missed you too, father.
Heh. Yeah... I mean, yes sensei.
Hey.
Thanks.
Hey little bro!
Just enjoying being home.
Say, what's up with April and Casey? I expected them to drop by after I got back.
They're living together now?
Is Casey at least still doing his hockey mask thing?
"Nightwatcher"? That some new comic book you're hooked on, Mikey?
This guy could bring heat on all of us if he keeps this up. Showboating isn't a replacement for justice...
Does ANYBODY train anymore?!
DONNAY!
Ninja tag, topside!
Have you been avoiding me? Barely seen you since I got home.
I see. So... you're definitely not upset at me or anything, right?
I don't know... your brother gets to go on a world-wide training mission and you have to stay home.
I'm just saying, I'd understand if you were upset.
Is that what this is about? You think Splinter likes me best?
We need to come up with a plan.
RAPH!!!
Raph. Save it for another day.
RAPH!

Hothead.

Save the brute vigilante junk for that Nightwing guy.
Whatever.
What are you talking about Casey?

Do bad guys still try to do that?
Or until we prove Winters is up to something more than collecting art.

Where's Raph?
Nice try, amateur.
Oof! You're a heavy boy, aren't you?
Okay, someone's been training pretty hard.
I want you to know that I appreciate your intentions. But you can't change the world like this.
What? How did you-
Goodnight, dark prince.
R-raph?
What?
I was training! Training to be a better leader! For you! Why do you hate me for that?!
Y OU WEREN'T READY! You're impatient and hot-tempered! And more importantly... I'm better than you.
Wh-wh-what took you s-so long?
Come to daddy.
They better hurry with that last monster!

I'm in.

OW! HEY! WHAT'RE YOU-OW!! OOF!

And quit touchin' my stuff.

NOOOOOOOO!!!!
Yes.

scenario for ya.

...and that's why it occurred in that specific South American region.

Now if we take into account the continual rotation of the Earth since then, as well as the gradual celestial shift that's happened and been recorded over... well, over the course of that mountain of books over there... we now know our new location.
New York City.

- well... tonight.

Look!

The crow-bar.
Can I ask you a question?

It's just a myth... a legend.

Azteks and Mayans.

A map of the stars, as recorded by an Aztec Shaman. They pinpoint the location of the Stars of Kikin...
-along with taking into account the point of origin of the first occurrence, we should know where another portal could take place.

Winters Tower.
Picked it up on my last trip to Japan. You... like it?

I was saving it for our anniversary.
That's our ride.

FAST! GO FAST NOW!!!

...yes.

-OOOHHHHHH!

Raph?
Nice to see ya, man.

And so yet again, police officials are baffled at a crime of retribution that can only be attributed to the mysterious figure M         known as "The Nightwatcher".
This is the latest in a string of vigilante acts that have been plaguing the city for the past year.
Although the victims have been criminals themselves, the Nightwatcher's actions have been identified as destructive and overly-violent... verging on the edge of lethal.
And in the latest of a string of strange criminal activity, a construction site was nearly destroyed last night. Authorities believe a violent battle had taken place earlier that evening.
Sounds like four turtles I used ta know.
Whatta we talkin' about, boys?

AAAARGH! AND STOP TOUCHING MY  STEREO TOO, MIKEY!!!

Well, I'm goin' to bed.
Leo's home.

means to do somethin' about it.

We get ready for round two.

I mean, it's in good hands.

Miss O'Neil. You are a vision.
Chris! How's it going?
So how was your trip?
...the gods be praised.
Y es. Of course.
It was a time long before the Mayans, April. Long before the Aztecs and even the Olmecs. It was a time of legends. A time of greatness. The true mother culture of Central America.
And for every culture they destroyed, they drank in all the magic and knowledge known to them.
They became a warring hurricane, gathering more power and knowledge with each conquest.
Then they came across a culture rich with science, magic and their own technology. A South American version of "Atlantis".
As the army approached, Yaotl used the knowledge they'd gained in black magic and sorcery. Timing their attack with the alignment of the Stars of Kikin, they opened a portal to another world.
They unleashed an army of monsters.
The monsters knew no side   - they destroyed the enemy... as   well as Yaotl's own army. Men who   swore to spill their blood for his   cause.
In the end, there were no victors.
Oh no, Miss O'Neil.
One of the girls will pay your fee on the way out.
You can come out now.
Your talents are commendable.
Well, I guess I'm just special that way.

I need the finely-tuned eyes and stealth of your Foot Ninja to...

Oooooooh...
